reference.title: copysign, copysignf : sign of y, magnitude of x

section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: copysign constructs a number with the magnitude (absolute value) of its first argument, x, and the sign of its second argument, y. copysignf does the same thing; the two functions differ only in the type of their arguments and result.

section.title: Returns
section.p: copysign returns a double with the magnitude of x and the sign of y. copysignf returns a float with the magnitude of x and the sign of y.
